cases.name: Massachusetts v. EPA
cases.description: Petitioners have asked us to answer two questions concerning the meaning of [the Clean Air Act]: whether EPA has the statutory authority to regulate greenhouse gas emissions from new motor vehicles; and if so, whether its stated reasons for refusing to do so are consistent with the statute.
